doc.name: PlotterBase
doc.description: Base class for plotters. This class contains an instance of the PlotBox class from the Ptolemy plot package as a public member, although which subclass of PlotBox is created is left to derived classes. It provides a parameter that determines whether to fill the plot when wrapup is invoked. It also has a legend parameter, which gives a comma-separated list of labels to attach to each dataset. Normally, the number of elements in this list should equal the number of input channels, although this is not enforced.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.property: If true, the plot will automatically rescale if necessary. This parameter has type BooleanToken, and default value false.
If true, fill the plot when wrapup is called. This parameter has type BooleanToken, and default value true.
A comma-separated list of labels to attach to each data set. This is always a string, with no enclosing quotation marks.
